appetizers.name: Dabeli
appetizers.description: A sweet and spicy potato mixture, put on a roll topped with pomegranate seeds, chutneys. A very popular street food from Bombay.

appetizers.name: Chicken Sixty-Five
appetizers.description: Chicken tender marinated with spices, and cooked in a yogurt sauce, with mustard seeds and curry leaves. A special from Hyderabad.

entrees.name: Hariyali Kofta
entrees.description: Mixed vegetable croquets cooked in a sauce made from fresh spinach, onions, tomatoes, ginger and garlic.

entrees.name: Chicken Bihari Kabob
entrees.description: Chicken breast cubes, marinated in yogurt and spices with a touch of sour cream.

entrees.name: Honey Garlic Lamb
entrees.description: Lamb cubes cooked with garlic and honey, onions and peppers, in a mild curry sauce.

entrees.name: Shrimp Vindaloo
entrees.description: Shrimps cooked in a spicy curry sauce with potatoes.

entrees.name: Tandoori Salmon Tikka
entrees.description: Fresh Chilean salmon fillets lightly marinated and cooked to perfection in the tandoor oven.
